name: .NTF File Extension
summary: Learn about .NTF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Lotus Notes, a business collaboration software program often used by large enterprises; created by Lotus Notes developers and used for storing custom Lotus Notes modules that can integrate into the larger Lotus Notes infrastructure.

content: NTF files can contain forms, source code, and other data used by the application.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
